snippet.title: [OP] Dead Man's Rest
snippet.description:
Dead Man's Rest is a Wild West themed BxB visual novel. Follow Lee McCarthy on his journey of revenge, love, and adventure.

STEAM PAGE: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1465640/Dead_Mans_Rest/
ITCH PAGE: https://gallium-games.itch.io/dead-mans-rest
